original_text: So when David and his men arrived at Ziklag, they saw that the Amalekites had destroyed the city. The Amalekites had taken away their wives, their sons and their daughters as prisoners.
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 사람들이 성읍에 이르러 본즉 성읍이 불탔고 자기들의 아내와 자녀들이 사로잡혔는지라

sentences.original_text: So when David and his men arrived at Ziklag
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 그의 사람들이 시글라에 도착했을 때

sentences.original_text: they saw that the Amalekites had destroyed the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아말렉 사람들이 성을 파괴했다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: The Amalekites had taken away their wives
their sons and their daughters as prisoners
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아들들과 딸들을 포로로 삼아 데려갔었다
